TopicTitle: Could we get the pre 1.1, mk1 cockpit as a mod?

Articles.Content:
Would it be possible for squad to release the old models of the mk1 and mk1 inline as mods when 1.1 hits?

I might be in the minority but I am a fan of the design of the old cockpits and would be fun to have them around as mods.

Also so that related mods can continue to exist (for instance the awesome Modified IVA by Masseflieger).

Follow this mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99020-1-0-4-Kerbal-Historical-Institute-presents-Original-KSP-Parts-3-3-27-06-15

If any one will carry the parts you want they will, and thank you for turning to modding instead of trying to make squad keep the old inefficient part
